name: Drawsalotls Dice Roller
description:
In this platformer game you play as a dice to roll to see the outcome of a story, there are 4 possible endings depending on what you roll and there are bonus dice spread through the level to increase your odds of rolling high. There is an intro level that just says the start to the scenario and then shows some cool dice rolling action before moving on to the real level.

The text in game Works best full screen, sorry.

Controls are space to jump and WASD or arrow keys to move.
